mapper.insert: INSERT INTO artist_reply(artistnumber, usernumber, replycontext, replygroup, replydept, userid) VALUES (#{artistNumber}, #{userNumber}, #{replyContext}, IF(#{replyNumber}=0, 0, #{replyNumber}), IF(#{replyNumber}=0, 0, 1), (select userid from user where usernumber=#{userNumber}));
mapper.select: select count(*) from artist_reply where artistnumber=#{artistNumber}
